title: bullrun2024bro
author: bullrun2024bro
content: Hi,I am looking for a skilled NFT designer for one of my clients. They are interested in a long-term cooperation, which includes NFTs, logos, scenes and more.If you're interested please send me a private message or reply here in the thread.Please also add your @Telegram handle and your portfolio.Generic messages in broken English will be ignored. Best,bullrun2020bro

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: We have a long list here. Some of them are highly skilled. Try contacting them individually. Good luck with whatever you are doing buddy.

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on November 01, 2022, 03:43:14 PMWe have a long list here. Some of them are highly skilled. Try contacting them individually. Good luck with whatever you are doing buddy.Thanks for the reply buddy.I contacted some people of the list you mentioned already. Unfortunately, however, not all designers also do NFT designs.  That's why I would appreciate an answer here, if you're a capable NFT designer.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Quote from: bullrun2020bro on November 01, 2022, 03:47:38 PMI contacted some people of the list you mentioned already. Unfortunately, however, not all designers also do NFT designs.   I'm curious to know the difference between the NFT Designer and just a regular designer. Isn't it just changing the designs based on the specific properties of the NFT? Like Eyes, Mouth, Head, Color, etc. and changing them accordingly?Anyway, have you tried checking in freelance servicing marketplaces? Like fiverr?

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Please don't turn this into a discussion thread. If you're not a designer, please don't post here. Thank you.Quote from: crwth on November 01, 2022, 04:25:37 PMAnyway, have you tried checking in freelance servicing marketplaces? Like fiverr?Yes, of course.

comments.author: noibla
comments.body: I have launched couple of NFTs in collaboration with other guys and I was the lead artist. Cybergorillas is one of them: https://cybergorillas.io/ . I will be ready to discuss more details in Telegram too:https://t.me/Relapsegfx
